resources.string: Enable TalkBack and Explore-by-touch from accessibility settings.Then touch the colored squares.

text1: Various kinds of data that will be auto-linked. In this text are some things that are actionable. For instance, you can click on http://www.google.com and it will launch the web brower. You can click on google.com too. If you click on (415) 555-1212 it should dial the phone. Or just write foobar@example.com for an e-mail link. If you have a URI link http://www.example.com/lala/foobar@example.com you should get the full link not the e-mail addree. Or you can put a location linke 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 12345, 123456, 1234567, 12345678, CA 94043. To summarize: https://www.google.com, or 650-253-00000, somebody@example.com, or 9606 North MoPac Expressway, Suite 400,Austin,TX 78759.
text2: Explicit links using <a> markup. This has markup for a link specified via an <a> tag. Use a \"tel:\" URL to dial a phone number.
This use the default marquee animation limit of 3
This will run the marquee animation once
This will run the marquee animation forever
